  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>1154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What happened during Holy Week?</string>
            <string language="es">¿Qué ocurrió durante la Semana Santa?</string>
            <string language="ga">Céard a Tharla i rith na Seachtaine Bheannaithe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was geschah während der Osterwoche?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que s'est produit pendant la semaine sainte ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que aconteceu durante a semana holy?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è accaduto durante la settimana santa?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που συνέβη κατά τη διάρκεια της ιερής 
εβδομάδας;</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Test your knowledge-How well do you know what happened during Easter Week?</string>
            <string language="es">Comprueba tus conocimientos: ¿Cuánto sabes sobre lo que pasó durante la Semana Santa?</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástáil d’eolas-Cé chomh maith is atá imeachtaí na Seachtaine Bheannaite ar eolas agat?</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfen Sie Ihr, Wissen-Wie wohl Sie wissen, was während 
der Ostern Woche geschah?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Testez le votre connaissance-Comment bon vous savez ce que
s'est produit pendant la semaine de Pâques ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste o seu conhecimento-Como bom você sabe o que 
aconteceu durante a semana de Easter?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esamini il vostro conoscenza-Come buono conoscete che cosa
è accaduto durante la settimana di Pasqua?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξετάστε το σας γνώση-πώς καλά ξέρετε τι συνέβη 
κατά τη διάρκεια της εβδομάδας Πάσχας;</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
